name: Rhythm Stacker
description:
Tap to the beat! (Click in the frame window to focus the game)

(Suggested offset values: MacOS+Firefox: -12, MacOS+Chrome: -19, Win+Firefox: -19, Win+Chrome: -26. This really differs based on individual systems, so you will probably need to adjust yourself.)

---HIGH SCORES---

01 MMZ | 239

02 BUG | 179

03 FIZ | 153

04 IMA | 123

05 ENE | 118

06 DNH | 111

07 WIN | 099

08 CHJ | 096

08 USR | 096

10 XOR | 088

11 INF | 086

12 DEU | 077

13 AAA | 000

14 AAA | 000

15 AAA | 000

16 AAA | 000

17 AAA | 000

18 AAA | 000

To post your high score, mention or message Ladybug on the Discord server with a screenshot and your three-letter name tag.

---CONTROLS---

SPACE, Z, or N to hit

LEFT and RIGHT to adjust offset

DOWN to toggle the late/early display in the corner

---DOWNLOAD---

There's a PICO-8 bug in the webplayer version where music very, very slowly goes out of sync if you leave it running long enough. Either adjust the offset, or refresh the page if this happens. Alternatively, you can download the png cartridge (if you have a PICO-8 runtime), or a standalone binary in the download links, which won't have the offset drift.
